channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Novo Nordisk missed its diversity targets last year, and its CEO paid a financial price
item.description: Novo Nordisk's CEO took a $1.5 million pay cut in 2024 as the pharma giant's share price tanked and it missed profit and DEI targets.

item.title: Defunding USAID Isn’t About Reducing The Deficit, It’s About Shutting Down Left-Wing Propaganda
item.description: USAID isn’t just a ridiculous scam on U.S. taxpayers, it funds leftist causes that erode western civilization and destroy traditional values.

item.title: Intersex People Don’t Negate Trump’s Two-Sexes Executive Order
item.description: People with intersex conditions have long been used as the bait in the Left’s motte-and-bailey argument to declare sex mutable at will. Don’t buy it.

item.title: Book Review: The Making of Modern Corporate Finance
